titleStmt.title: Reports of that grave and learned judge, Sir John Bridgman, knight, serjeant at law, sometime chief justice of Chester to which are added two exact tables, the one of the cases, and the other of the principal matters therein contained.
titleStmt.author: Bridgman, John, Sir.
J. H.
England and Wales. Court of Common Pleas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Roycroft for H. Twyford, Tho. Dring, and Jo. Place ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
